alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 3:50AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Callahan and southeastern Shackelford Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 350 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mccarty Lake, or 8 miles south of Albany, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moran, Mccarty Lake, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line and I-20 Near The Callahan- Eastland County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 322 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
